description: Footage captures loud bangs at a site used to store munitions south-east of the capital, Moscow.
title: Blaze at Russian munitions depot causes mass evacuations
title_page: Blaze at Russian munitions depot causes mass evacuations - BBC News
maintext: Last year, more than 9,500 people had to be evacuated after a blaze broke out at an ammunition dump in Siberia. Ten large Il-76 cargo planes and five Mi-8 helicopters were called in to water-bomb the area, near the town of Achinsk in the Krasnoyarsk region.
